languages.text: {n}Охранные системы колонии пробудились, могучие воздуходувные машины выкачали токсичный газ из недр планеты и загнали его в вентиляционные системы добывающих комплексов. Восстание завершилось за минуты — тысячи каторжан и надзирателей были удушены.{/n}

{n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Охранные системы колонии пробудились, могучие воздуходувные машины выкачали токсичный газ из недр планеты и загнали его в вентиляционные системы добывающих комплексов. Восстание завершилось за минуты — тысячи каторжан и надзирателей были удушены.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The colony's security systems have awakened, the powerful air blowers have pumped the toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion had been finished in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and wardens have suffocated.{/n}

languages.text: {n}殖民地的安全系统被激活，大功率的鼓风机将毒气从行星内部抽到矿井的通风系统中。短短几分钟内，这场叛乱就被镇压了下去，成千上万的犯人和监察员都被毒气熏死了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}殖民地的安全系统被激活，大功率的鼓风机将毒气从行星内部抽到矿井的通风系统中。短短几分钟内，这场叛乱就被镇压了下去，成千上万的犯人和监察员都被毒气熏死了。{/n}
{n}殖民地的安全系统被唤醒，强大的鼓风机将毒气从行星内部抽到矿井的通风系统中。短短几分钟内，这场叛乱就被镇压了下去，成千上万的犯人和监察员都被毒气熏死了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los sistemas de seguridad de la colonia despertaron para enviar el gas tóxico de las entrañas del planeta a los sistemas de ventilación de las instalaciones mineras. La rebelión llegó a su fin en unos minutos: miles de convictos y supervisores murieron de asfixia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los sistemas de seguridad de la colonia despertaron para enviar el gas tóxico de las entrañas del planeta a los sistemas de ventilación de las instalaciones mineras. La rebelión llegó a su fin en unos minutos: miles de convictos y supervisores murieron de asfixia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}コロニーの警備システムが起動し、強力な送風機によって有毒ガスを惑星の地下から吸い上げて鉱山施設の換気システムに送り込んだ。反乱軍はほんの数分で鎮圧され...何千人もの受刑者と看守が窒息死した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コロニーの警備システムが起動し、強力な送風機によって有毒ガスを惑星の地下から吸い上げて鉱山施設の換気システムに送り込んだ。反乱軍はほんの数分で鎮圧され...何千人もの受刑者と看守が窒息死した。{/n}
{n}コロニーの警備システムが起動し、強力な送風機によって有毒ガスを惑星の地下から吸い上げて鉱山施設の換気システムに送り込んだ。反乱軍はほんの数分で鎮圧され...何千人もの受刑者と看守が窒息死した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les systèmes de sécurité de la colonie se déclenchent, les puissantes souffleries crachant un gaz toxique provenant les entrailles de la planète dans les systèmes de ventilation des installations minières. La rébellion est matée en quelques minutes à peine... mais des milliers de détenus et de contremaîtres sont asphyxiés au passage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les systèmes de sécurité de la colonie se déclenchent, les puissantes souffleries crachant un gaz toxique provenant les entrailles de la planète dans les systèmes de ventilation des installations minières. La rébellion est matée en quelques minutes à peine... mais des milliers de détenus et de contremaîtres sont asphyxiés au passage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Sicherheitssysteme der Kolonie erwachten. Die mächtigen Gebläse pumpten giftiges Gas aus dem Inneren des Planeten in die Belüftungssysteme der Bergbauanlagen. Die Rebellion war nach wenigen Minuten zerschlagen ... Tausende von Sträflinge und Aufsehern waren erstickt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Sicherheitssysteme der Kolonie erwachten. Die mächtigen Gebläse pumpten giftiges Gas aus dem Inneren des Planeten in die Belüftungssysteme der Bergbauanlagen. Die Rebellion war nach wenigen Minuten zerschlagen ... Tausende von Sträflinge und Aufsehern waren erstickt.{/n}

{n}Die Sicherheitssysteme der Kolonie wurden aufgeweckt. Die mächtigen Luftgebläse pumpten giftiges Gas aus dem Inneren des Planeten in die Belüftungssysteme der Bergbauanlagen. Die Rebellion war nach wenigen Minuten zerschlagen — tausende von Sträflinge und Wärter waren erstickt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Koloninin asayiş sistemleri dirilerek gezegenin içinden maden tesislerinin havalandırma sistemlerine zehirli gaz pompaladı. Binlerce mahkûm ve gözetmenin boğulmasıyla isyan, birkaç dakika içinde bastırılmış oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The colony's security systems awakened, its powerful air blowers pumping toxic gas out of the bowels of the planet and into the ventilation systems of the mining facilities. The rebellion was quashed in mere minutes — thousands of convicts and overseers had suffocated.{/n}
